title: Our World in Data

description: Research and data to make progress against the world's largest problems
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Data Explorer Explore all of our data on COVID-19 vaccinations, cases, excess mortality, and much more. 3709 charts across 297 topics All free: open access and open source Find out how our work is used by journalists and researchers Find out how our work is used in teaching
